name: FORNAX-11
description:
FORNAX-11

a puzzle platformer where your goal is to keep energy until the final level, and if you consumed all of your energy you will be back to the first level so try using energy more efficient to reach the last level.

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move and jump

- "X" for Interactions

- "R" for restarting the level

This game made for LD 47, this is my first game jam and it lacks a lot of things and i didn't have the time for audio stuff  :(

For rating: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/fornax-11
